GUI

Class DefaultTableModelEdited

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
        • GUI.DefaultTableModelEdited
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class DefaultTableModelEdited
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
    This is a decorator class which extends the DefaultTableModel class. Some methods are overridden with the intend of satisfying requirements of non-editability in some cases. Also this class provides additional restrictions in concern with the input values given
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    ES1-2017-IC1-70
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This Enumerate is used to determine which type of list to construct.

      DefaultTableModelEdited(java.lang.Object[] columnNames, int columnsrowCount, DefaultTableModelEdited.ListType listType)
      This method constructs a DefaultTableModelEdited with as many columns as there are elements in columnNames and rowCount of null object values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultTableModelEdited

        public DefaultTableModelEdited(java.lang.Object[] columnNames,
                               int columnsrowCount,
                               DefaultTableModelEdited.ListType listType)
        This method constructs a DefaultTableModelEdited with as many columns as there are elements in columnNames and rowCount of null object values. Each column's name will be taken from the columnNames array.
        Parameters:
        columnNames - array containing the names of the new columns
        columnsrowCount - the number of rows the table holds
        listType - the type of list do be constructed

    • Method Detail

      • addRow

        public void addRow(java.lang.Object[] rowData)
        This method adds a row to the end of the model. The new row will contain null values unless rowData is specified. Notification of the row being added will be generated.
        Overrides:
        addRow in class javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
        Parameters:
        rowData - - optional data of the row being added

      • fireTableCellUpdated

        public void fireTableCellUpdated(int rowsNumber,
                                 int columnsNumber)
        This method notifies all listeners that the value of the cell at [row, column] has been updated.
        Overrides:
        fireTableCellUpdated in class javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
        Parameters:
        rowsNumber - row of cell which has been updated
        columnsNumber - column of cell which has been updated

      • isCellEditable

        public boolean isCellEditable(int row,
                              int column)
        This method returns true or false depending on the type of the list
        Specified by:
        isCellEditable in interface javax.swing.table.TableModel
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        column - - the column whose value is to be queried
